text:
[Verse]
City lights they shine so bright
Neon glow all through the night
Lost in crowds feeling slight
Wandering streets no end in sight

[Verse 2]
Footsteps echo on concrete
Strangers pass we never meet
Building shadows where I retreat
In this madness incomplete

[Chorus]
Lost in the city oh so grand
Searching for a place to land
Lost in the city understand
I'm just a face in this vast expanse

[Verse 3]
Buses roar and taxis zoom
Skyscrapers pierce through the gloom
Hustle bustle traffic's boom
In this urban maze consume

[Bridge]
Flickering signs and busy tones
Concrete jungle's endless zones
Connections made through our phones
Hearts longing to find their home

[Chorus]
Lost in the city oh so grand
Searching for a place to land
Lost in the city understand
I'm just a face in this vast expanse
title: Lost in the City
